sentences: Alice Charlotta Tegnér (Swedish: [aˈliːs tɛŋˈneːr]; 12 March 1864  –  26 May 1943) was a Swedish music teacher, poet and composer.
Born Alice Sandström in Karlshamn, Sweden, she was the daughter of Eduard Sandström (1829–1879), a ship captain.
She attended seminars  in Stockholm (Högre lärarinneseminariet) and trained as a teacher.
Her well-known hymnbook Nu ska vi sjunga, with illustrations by Elsa Beskow, was published in 1943.
